item.title: SuccessRate - Improve your YC/500/TC application with feedback from alumni

item.content:encoded: You are welcome to submit your draft application before a deadline to get alumni feedback. The sooner you submit more feedback you get.

item.title: Static.app - One-click hosting solution for your static website
item.description: Static.app is the easiest way to host a static HTML website online. Drag-and-drop an archive with your page or an entire website and we will take care of the rest. Everything is included: SSL certificate, code editor, forms and media storage all in one place.
item.content:encoded: Static.app is the easiest way to host a static HTML website online. Drag-and-drop an archive with your page or an entire website and we will take care of the rest. Everything is included: SSL certificate, code editor, forms and media storage all in one place.

item.content:encoded: Take a free space flight to get a personalized report showing unique insights into your meetings from 2021. From total hours in meetings to number of people you met & other fun trends! Claim your bragging rights by sharing your meeting report!
